name: syl5breq
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wbr(c0, c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c2))
-| wbr(c0, c1, c3)

comment: A chained equality inference for a binary relation. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-1999.)
